messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: 'e' is defined but never used.
'firstPage' is assigned a value but never used.
'result' is defined but never used.
'config' is defined but never used.

suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useCallback has a missing dependency: 'initialValue'. Either include it or remove the dependency array. If 'setStoredValue' needs the current value of 'initialValue', you can also switch to useReducer instead of useState and read 'initialValue' in the reducer.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [initialValue, key]

suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useCallback has a missing dependency: 'options'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [action, options]
